Name: A hundred kinds of your smile
About the game: Jenny and Lisa are living happily together. But Lisa left home because of a sudden disaster. Jenny decided to go and find her lover. She travelled many parallel worlds, and met many Jenny and Lisa. What kind of story will happen between them? Can she finally return to her world and successfully find Lisa? This is a heartwarming and healing journey to find love, a RPG game full of joy and happiness. In the pure fairy tale world, there are various landscapes, fun stories, also lovely NPC charactors and a few puzzles for you to solve. Start the adventure and enjoy the journey with Jenny! The game has 3 bad endings and 1 happy ending. It takes about 50 mins to work through.
